articles.description: We've got fixes for a cursor moving on its own, uncontrollable scrolling, update issues and more Microsoft problems.
articles.content:
Got Window's 10 problems? We've got answers. 
Stephen Shankland/CNET
Windows 10 ($150 at Amazon) is now on more than 1 billion devices worldwide. While Microsoft releases monthly security patches a… [+9659 chars]
